content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) which is currently working and smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (5.0, 5.0)) which is currently not working due to no ingredients to smelt and its result inventory being full.

### Electricity generator at position (-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position (-11.5, 18.5)) which is not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.
- Boiler (position (-11.5, 25.0)) which is out of fuel.
- Offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5)) which is currently working and providing water.

### PipeGroup at position (-12.5, 15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- A series of pipes connecting the steam engine, boiler, and offshore pump, facilitating the flow of water and steam.

### ElectricityGroup
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric poles (position (2.5, -18.5) and others) which are currently not providing power due to disconnection.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. In this case, coal was needed but not available.

### Errors when connecting electricity poles
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory when attempting to connect electricity poles. The connection failed due to a lack of necessary items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. This can prevent connection issues and ensure proper placement of structures.
